main event: An unidentified object was sighted while flying over Andrews AFB on 10 September 1951.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 5 seconds., The object was described as a streak of blue flame that changed to white at the end., The observers estimated the object's speed to be over 500 mph., The sighting occurred at night with bright moonlight and clear visibility., The object disappeared without leaving any visible outline or trailing lights.
sighted object: streak of light, possibly a flame
witness description: Co-pilots in a C-47 during a routine flight.
